Sentencas: This paper reports the results of experimental work carried out on a micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system that uses the waste heat from the fuel cell for dehumidification and cooling though the integration of an open cycle liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling system.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: The experimental results demonstrate regeneration of the potassium formate solution using the thermal output from the SOFC in the first of its kind tri-generation system.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: Optimisation has shown that a 2.2 L min(-1) regenerator desiccant volumetric flow facilitates best performance.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: When integrated with the micro-SOFC, the open cycle desiccant system demonstrates a COP of approaching 0.7, an encouraging value for a waste heat driven cooling system of this capacity.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: A tri-generation performance analysis is presented which serves to demonstrate the novel system operating in a building.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: The system achieved an electrical efficiency of 11% and regeneration efficiency of approximately 37%.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency is lower than that predicted by the company supplying the micro-tubular SOFC, because the unit suffered sulphur poisoning during preliminary tests.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: The electrical power output decreased from 250 W to 150 W, which reduced the electrical efficiency from around 18% to 11% and the overall efficiency from approximately 45% to just over 37%.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system

Sentencas: Low temperature (33-36 degrees C) regeneration was demonstrated.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of a micro-tubular SOFC membrane-separated liquid desiccant dehumidification and cooling tri-generation system
